alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 06 at 2:56PM MST until January 08 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Periods of heavy snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet. Winds gusting to 50 mph. * WHERE...Absaroka/Beartooth Mountains. Greatest accumulations on west and southwest-facing slopes. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Saturday. Expect more heavy snow tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel and recreation activities could be very difficult to impossible. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Another 4 to 9 inches of snow is expected tonight. After tonight, snow will accumulate several inches each period, Friday and Friday night.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1. Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at http://www.weather.gov/billings
